Markdown states that symbols & and < must be escaped to ease writing. However if & is part of html entity like © it must not be escaped. Similary, if < is part of html tag like it must not be escaped as well. Inside code spans like this <html><head></head></html> < is always escaped. Same rule apply to code blocks like this:

<html>
    <head><title>"Markdown"</title></title></head>
    <a href="http://example.com?foo=bar&bar=baz">Link</a>
</html>
